name: Tiny Sprouts Program (Ages 2–3)
description: At age two, your child is ready to absorb more than you might imagine. The Tiny Sprouts Program offers a calm, intentional Montessori environment — where young children aren’t just cared for, but guided to build real-life skills that strengthen their focus, confidence, and early development. What They’ll Begin to Build: - Focus & coordination through hands-on materials that strengthen fine motor skills - Confidence & independence through meaningful daily routines they can do on their own - Langu
